chunks.lyrics: Play Riff 2 "Cause I want to be..."
This lead is played over the chorus:
The final time another guitar is added:
Here are the solos inbetween the choruses:
<17> = touch the string above the 17th fret while
10b13* = tremolo bar bend, from the 10th fret to the 13th fret.
7d4* = tremolo bar dive, from the 7th fret to the 4th fret.
